info.title: gx-compliance
info.description: Prototype for a compliance service as defined in https://gaia-x.gitlab.io/policy-rules-committee/trust-framework/

proofPurpose.description: The proofPurpose property is used to associate a purpose, such as assertionMethod or authentication with a proof

jws.description: JSON Web Signature for a given self description

verificationMethod.description: Public key as PEM-encoded SPKI string

@context.description: The context to be used for the self description.

type.description: The type of the self description.

id.description: The identifier of the self description.

issuer.description: The identifier of the issuer of the credential.

issuanceDate.description: The date of issuance of the credential.

url.description: A resolvable link to the Terms and Conditions document.

hash.description: sha256 hash of the document provided at the given url.

id.description: The identifier of the credential subject.

providedBy.description: A resolvable link to the participant Self-Description providing the service.

aggregationOf.description: Resolvable link(s) to the Self-Description(s) of resources related to the service and that can exist independently of it.

termsAndConditions.description: Physical location of the companys legal registration.

dataExport.description: List of methods to export data out of the service.

@context.description: The context to be used for the self description.

domain.description: The date of issuance of the credential.

presentation_submission.description: Presentation Submission object for this presentation

url.description: The HTTP location of the Participant Self Description to verify

code.description: Country principal subdivision code in ISO 3166-2 format

country_code.description: Country Code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

id.description: The identifier of the credential subject.

registrationNumber.description: Registration number(s) which identify one specific company.

externalDocs.description: For more information see the Trust Framework docs

headquarterAddress.description: Physical location of the companys head quarter.

legalAddress.description: Physical location of the companys legal registration.

termsAndConditions.description: SHA512 of the generic Terms and Conditions for Gaia-X Ecosystem as defined in the Trust Framework

leiCode.description: Unique LEI number as defined by https://www.gleif.org.

parentOrganisation.description: A (list of) direct participant(s) that this entity is a subOrganization of, if any.

subOrganisation.description: A (list of) direct participant(s) with a legal mandate on this entity, e.g., as a subsidiary.

url.description: The HTTP location of the Service Offering Self Description to verify
